title: Enhancing E-Learning Practical Competencies: Constructivist and Traditional Science Teaching Designs Utilizing YouTube

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three constructivist science lesson designs using YouTube content.

Learners propose at least two project-based assessment methods utilizing YouTube videos.
